complies_with: if the project is using a sampling protocol for all samples, describe it here, else blank

produced_by.has_feature_of_interest: default value for project; could be replaced on individual sample basis

responsibility.name: ... populate with Agent object; template leaves slot because collector is required

sampling_site.description: template can contain generic site description, sample collectors add detail for individual samples
sampling_site.label: some standard syntax with generic name for site and detail name for particular sampling event; Template prepopulate with generic name

authorized_by: any permits under which the sampling is operating;
